forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 16 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds beneath a mostly sunny sky, where the gentle caress of the west wind brings a briskness to the air, sweeping across the iconic streets and vibrant neighborhoods. As the day drifts into early evening, a temperature mirroring the coolness of the ocean wraps around your shoulders, hinting at the approaching twilight. The clarity of the skyline, punctuated by the distant Golden Gate, complements the vibrant scene, unmarred by lingering fog or the blanket of the marine layer that often graces this locale. Though wispy clouds can be seen faintly adorning the horizon, the day feels refreshingly open, allowing for a panoramic view of the urban landscape.

As night approaches, the temperature will dip into the cool embrace of the low fifties, inviting you to layer up with a light jacket or a cozy sweater. The strong winds may stir a sense of adventure, inspiring a stroll along the piers or maybe a quiet sit at a café with friends, exchanging stories as the sun sets over the bay. Embrace the coolness of the evening, perchance paired with a warm cup, and enjoy the ambiance of a city that thrives both in daylight and under the veil of night.
